channel.title: OpenTelemetry-Native Traces, Metrics, and Logs in a single pane
channel.description: A single tool for all your observability needs - APM, logs, metrics, exceptions, alerts, and dashboards powered by a powerful query builder.
channel.item: https://www.signoz.io/blog/ten-reasons-not-add-observability Ten reasons not to add observability https://www.signoz.io/blog/ten-reasons-not-add-observability undefined Fri, 22 Sep 2023 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (SigNoz Inc) OpenTelemetryobservabilityjokes
